snippet.title: Those Who Came: X-Mass Update Gameplay Trailer | December 2021
snippet.description:
Those Who Came is a sci-fi multiplayer game where teamwork is the key to healing a planet on the verge of collapse. Overcome the dangers of Solarus along with other explorers, restore useful facilities, meet new allies and survive extinction together as you search for the Primal Seed that will allow you to revive this land.

Visit the Store page on Steam:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1708570/Those_who_Came/

Learn more about the X-Mass patch:
https://store.steampowered.com/news/app/1708570/view/3106917607890062868

Get in touch with us and join the conversation on:
https://instagram.com/rolldboxgames
https://twitter.com/rolldboxgames
https://discord.gg/aSNuvRsUHj
